column1: CSS,Text,"Create the BULLET PROOF font face declaration for a font with these characteristics:

column2: src: url(""./assets/fonts/Jura-Regular.eot""); // EOT fonts first to fix bugs in older versions of IE.
src: url(""./assets/fonts/Jura-Regular.woff2"") format('woff2'), // Newer-better formats WOFF2 earlier on.

column3: url(""./assets/fonts/Jura-Regular.ttf"") format('truetype'); // Not so good formats TTF later on.
